content.rendered:
Directed by Vi Anand.

Written by Vi Anand. Vi Anand. Vi Anand. Vijay Kamisetty. Vijay Kamisetty. Abburi Ravi.

Cast Nikhil Siddharth(Arjun). Hebah Patel(Nithya / Amala). Nandita Shwetha(Parvathi / Amala). Avika Gor(Ayesha). Tanikella Bharani(High School Principal). Vennela Kishore(Kishore). Thagubothu Ramesh(BenzCircle Babji) .Mahesh Achanta. Annapoorna(Grandma).Chammak Chandra. Harsha Chemudu((as Viva Harsha)). Jeeva(SI). Praveen(Ghanta Ram). Prudhviraj(Doctor). Josh Ravi(Arjun’s Friend #2). Raja Ravindra(Parvathi’s Would Be). Satya(Satya). Apoorva Srinivasan(Nithya’s Friend). Fish Venkat(Man at the Dhaba). Gagan Vihari(Goon)

Language Telugu.

Production Goldmines Telefilms. Meghana Arts.
